settings.notesContent:
Required Elements & Features (Enable in Dashboard)

  • Tabs component
  • Icon Framework
  • Card Framework

Monthly/Yearly Options

The grid of options is duplicated. One copy is for monthly options and one is for yearly options. The tabs component flips back and forth between the options. Make sure you configure both!

Plan buttons

The plan buttons have an aria-label for accessibility (attributes panel). You need to customize this aria-label on each button to match the plan name.

Features List

The icon styling in the features list is controlled by the icon framework as part of the "icon list" feature.

Featured option

The featured option is controlled with a data attribute on the specific plan you want to feature. The attribute is "data-featured-price-column" and the value of the attribute will be used as the featured label. In the default frame, the value is "Popular," but you can change this to whatever you want.

Force even columns

This table is configured to force even columns on stacking. If you want to remove this or if you have an uneven number of columns, go to the CSS area on the grid class and scroll down to find the code labeled as forcing even columns. Remove this block of code and the grid will stack normally.

Highlight text in feature heading

This is done with a span using the class ".plan-reference" and the styling can be updated in the CSS area of Pricing Table Echo.
